data.eml:eml: A revised subgeneric position for Polypedilum (Probolum) simantokeleum, with description of a new Uresipedilum species in Japan (Diptera: Chironomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yamamoto, Nao, Yamamoto, Masaru (2015): A revised subgeneric position for Polypedilum (Probolum) simantokeleum, with description of a new Uresipedilum species in Japan (Diptera: Chironomidae). Zootaxa 3999 (3): 439-445, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3999.3.9
